workflow.name: Intelligent workflow maintenance system with smart AI filtering & Google Workspace
workflow.description:
## üîß AI-Powered Auto-Maintenance System for n8n

Transform your n8n instance management with this advanced automation system featuring **artificial intelligence-driven workflow selection**. This template provides comprehensive maintenance operations with smart filtering capabilities.

### ‚ú® Key Features

**ü§ñ Artificial Intelligence Engine**
- Multi-criteria scoring system for intelligent workflow selection
- Semantic analysis for business-critical pattern recognition
- Automated decision-making with configurable thresholds

**üéØ Core Maintenance Operations**
- **Security Audits**: Automated vulnerability scanning with Google Sheets reporting
- **Smart Pause/Resume**: Intelligent workflow suspension during maintenance windows
- **AI Backup Creation**: Selective duplication of high-value workflows
- **Intelligent Export**: Comprehensive system backups with metadata

**üîê Enterprise Security**
- Token-based authentication with request validation
- Protected workflow safeguards (never modifies critical systems)
- Comprehensive error handling and logging

**‚ö° Automation & Scheduling**
- Configurable maintenance schedules (daily, weekly, monthly)
- Webhook-driven operations for external integration
- Real-time monitoring and statistics

### üéØ Perfect For

- **DevOps Teams**: Streamline n8n maintenance operations
- **Enterprise Users**: Manage large-scale workflow environments  
- **System Administrators**: Automated security and backup management
- **Advanced Users**: Leverage AI for intelligent workflow management

### üöÄ Quick Setup

1. Import the template
2. Configure 4 credentials (n8n API, Google Sheets, Google Drive, Webhook Auth)
3. Set your security token and Google Sheet ID
4. Activate and enjoy automated maintenance!

### üß† AI Intelligence Highlights

The system evaluates workflows using 6+ criteria including activity status, complexity, priority tags, business criticality, and recent updates. Workflows are automatically scored and selected based on intelligent thresholds.

**Selection Logic:**
- Duplicate threshold: ‚â•3 points (smart backup selection)
- Export threshold: ‚â•5 points (comprehensive backup)
- System workflows always protected

### üìä Includes

- 25+ configured nodes with emoji naming
- 4 detailed markdown documentation cards
- Pre-configured schedules and examples
- Comprehensive error handling
- Statistical reporting and monitoring

Perfect for organizations looking to implement **intelligent, automated n8n maintenance** with minimal manual intervention.

parameters.content:
# üîß n8n Auto-Maintenance System

## Overview
Advanced workflow automation with AI-powered intelligent selection

## üéØ Core Actions
- **üîí AUDIT**: Security analysis & reporting
- **‚è∏Ô∏è PAUSE**: Temporary workflow suspension  
- **üîÑ DUPLICATE**: Smart backup creation
- **üì§ EXPORT**: Complete system backup

## ‚ú® Key Features
- ü§ñ AI-driven workflow filtering
- üîê Secure token-based authentication
- üìä Automated reporting to Google Sheets
- ‚òÅÔ∏è Google Drive integration
- ‚ö° Scheduled maintenance cycles

# üß† Artificial Intelligence Engine

## Smart Scoring System
| Criteria | Points | Description |
|----------|--------|-------------|
| **Active Status** | +2 | Currently running |
| **Complexity** | +1-3 | Node count based |
| **Priority Tags** | +3 | Critical/Important |
| **Business Critical** | +2-5 | Production patterns |
| **Recent Updates** | +1-3 | Maintenance activity |

## üéØ Selection Thresholds
- **Duplicate**: ‚â•3 points
- **Export**: ‚â•5 points or system workflow

## üîç Pattern Recognition
Automatically detects business-critical workflows using semantic analysis

# üîê Security Framework

## Authentication
- ‚úÖ **Bearer YOUR_TOKEN_HERE** validation required
- ‚úÖ **Request format** validation
- ‚úÖ **Action whitelist** enforcement
- ‚úÖ **Error handling** with proper HTTP codes

## Protected Workflows
> **‚ö†Ô∏è Never modified by automation**

- `n8n-auto-maintenance`
- `Security` 
- `Backup`

## Supported Actions
`audit` ‚Ä¢ `pause` ‚Ä¢ `resume` ‚Ä¢ `duplicate` ‚Ä¢ `export` ‚Ä¢ `cleanup`

# ‚öôÔ∏è Configuration & Scheduling

## Default Schedules
- **üîí Audit**: Weekly (Monday 21:00)
- **‚è∏Ô∏è Pause**: Daily (22:00) 
- **üì§ Export**: Monthly (Day 1, 09:00)

## Required Credentials
1. **n8n API**: Full workflow access
2. **Google Sheets**: Audit logging
3. **Google Drive**: Export storage
4. **Webhook Auth**: Security validation

## Environment Variables
WEBHOOK_TOKEN=your_secure_token_here
GOOGLE_SHEET_ID=your_sheet_id
MAINTENANCE_HOUR=22

# üîß n8n Advanced Auto-Maintenance System

[![n8n](https://img.shields.io/badge/n8n-Template-FF6D5A?logo=n8n)](https://n8n.io)
[![License: MIT](https://img.shields.io/badge/License-MIT-yellow.svg)](https://opensource.org/licenses/MIT)
[![Maintenance](https://img.shields.io/badge/Maintained%3F-yes-green.svg)](https://github.com/yourusername/n8n-auto-maintenance/graphs/commit-activity)

## üìã Overview

Advanced workflow automation system with **AI-powered intelligent selection** for n8n maintenance operations. Automates security audits, workflow management, backups, and exports with smart filtering capabilities.

### ‚ú® Key Features

- **ü§ñ AI-Driven Selection**: Intelligent workflow filtering using multi-criteria scoring
- **üîê Secure Authentication**: Token-based security with protected workflows  
- **üìä Automated Reporting**: Security audit results to Google Sheets
- **‚òÅÔ∏è Cloud Integration**: Export backups to Google Drive
- **‚ö° Scheduled Operations**: Automated maintenance cycles
- **üéØ Granular Control**: Tag-based and pattern filtering

## üéØ Core Actions

| Action | Description | Trigger | AI Filter |
|--------|-------------|---------|-----------|
| **üîí AUDIT** | Security analysis & reporting | Weekly (Mon 21:00) | ‚ùå |
| **‚è∏Ô∏è PAUSE** | Temporary workflow suspension | Daily (22:00) | ‚úÖ |  
| **üîÑ DUPLICATE** | Smart backup creation | On-demand | ‚úÖ (‚â•3 pts) |
| **üì§ EXPORT** | Complete system backup | Monthly (1st, 09:00) | ‚úÖ (‚â•5 pts) |

## üöÄ Quick Start

### Prerequisites

- n8n instance (v1.0+) with API enabled
- Google Workspace account (Sheets + Drive)
- Webhook endpoint access

### Installation

1. **Import Template**

Download the workflow JSON
curl -O https://github.com/yourusername/n8n-auto-maintenance/raw/main/workflow.json

Import in n8n interface: Settings ‚Üí Import workflow


2. **Configure Credentials**
- `your_n8n_api_credential`: n8n API credentials
- `your_google_sheets_credential`: Google Sheets OAuth2
- `your_google_drive_credential`: Google Drive OAuth2
- `your_webhook_auth_credential`: Header auth with token

3. **Environment Setup**
WEBHOOK_TOKEN=your_secure_token_here_32_chars_min
GOOGLE_SHEET_ID=1BxiMVs0XRA5nFMdKvBdBZjgmUUqptlbs74OgvE2upms
MAINTENANCE_HOUR=22


4. **Test Setup**
curl -X POST https://your-instance.com/webhook/ops/n8n
-H "Authorization: Bearer YOUR_TOKEN_HERE"
-H "Content-Type: application/json"
-d '{"action":"audit","options":{"reason":"Setup test"}}'


## üìñ Detailed Documentation

- [üìã Installation Guide](docs/installation.md)
- [üîß Configuration Reference](docs/configuration.md)
- [ü§ñ AI Filtering Logic](docs/ai-filtering.md)
- [üîí Security Best Practices](docs/security.md)
- [üêõ Troubleshooting](docs/troubleshooting.md)

## ü§ñ AI Intelligence

### Smart Scoring System

| Criteria | Points | Logic |
|----------|--------|-------|
| **Active Status** | +2 | Currently running workflows |
| **Complexity** | +1-3 | Based on node count (>10: +1, >20: +3) |
| **Priority Tags** | +3 | `critical`, `important`, `core`, `production` |
| **Business Critical** | +2-5 | Semantic analysis of workflow names |
| **Recent Activity** | +1-3 | Last modification (<7d: +3, <30d: +1) |

### Selection Thresholds
- **Duplicate**: ‚â•3 points (smart backup selection)
- **Export**: ‚â•5 points or system workflow (comprehensive backup)

## üîê Security

### Protected Workflows
These workflows are **never** modified by automation:
- `n8n-auto-maintenance` (this workflow itself)
- `Security` (security-related workflows)  
- `Backup` (backup workflows)

### Authentication
- Bearer YOUR_TOKEN_HERE required for all operations
- Request validation and sanitization
- Action whitelist enforcement
- Comprehensive error handling

## üìä Monitoring & Logging

- **Google Sheets**: Audit results with severity classification
- **Console Logs**: Detailed execution information
- **Error Responses**: Structured JSON with HTTP status codes
- **Statistics**: Workflow counts, success rates, performance metrics

## üõ†Ô∏è API Reference

### Request Format
{
"action": "audit|pause|duplicate|export",
"filters": {
"tags": "production,critical",
"namePattern": ".Business."
},
"options": {
"excludeCritical": true,
"reason": "Scheduled maintenance"
}
}

### Response Format
{
"success": true,
"message": "Action completed successfully",
"timestamp": "2025-08-16T08:47:00Z",
"affected_workflows": 5,
"statistics": {
"processed": 12,
"selected": 5,
"skipped": 7
}
}


## üìà Changelog

### v2.0.0 (Latest)
- ‚ú® AI-powered workflow selection
- üîí Enhanced security framework
- üìä Advanced reporting capabilities
- ‚òÅÔ∏è Google Drive integration
- üéØ Granular filtering options

## ü§ù Contributing

1. Fork the repository
2. Create a feature branch (`git checkout -b feature/amazing-feature`)
3. Commit changes (`git commit -m 'Add amazing feature'`)
4. Push to branch (`git push origin feature/amazing-feature`)  
5. Open a Pull Request

## üìÑ License

This project is licensed under the MIT License - see the [LICENSE](LICENSE) file for details.

## üôè Acknowledgments

- n8n community for the amazing automation platform
- AI/ML community for intelligent filtering concepts
- Contributors and beta testers

---

‚≠ê **Star this repo if it helped you automate your n8n maintenance!**

data.details:
The IF node can be used to implement binary conditional logic in your workflow. You can set up one-to-many conditions to evaluate each item of data being inputted into the node. That data will either evaluate to TRUE or FALSE and route out of the node accordingly.

This node has multiple types of conditions: Bool, String, Number, and Date & Time.
